analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x48a52cdea9566078db0eb82cfed671f061774492.sol:
	Contract CCS has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x48a52cdea9566078db0eb82cfed671f061774492.sol#286-287)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x48a52cdea9566078db0eb82cfed671f061774492.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0x48a52cdea9566078db0eb82cfed671f061774492.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x48a52cdea9566078db0eb82cfed671f061774492.sol#21) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of CCS.increaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0x48a52cdea9566078db0eb82cfed671f061774492.sol#220) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of CCS.increaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0x48a52cdea9566078db0eb82cfed671f061774492.sol#220) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of CCS.decreaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0x48a52cdea9566078db0eb82cfed671f061774492.sol#228-229) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_subtractedValue' of CCS.decreaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0x48a52cdea9566078db0eb82cfed671f061774492.sol#229-230) is not in mixedCase
